title.rendered: App for Farmworkers Adds New Partner Thanks to Grant Funding

content.rendered:
We are excited to welcome the Pennsylvania Farmworker Project of Philadelphia Legal Assistance to the Vamos app network of partners thanks to grant funding from the American Bar Endowment.

Vamos is a mobile app that assists outreach workers in planning, finding, conducting, tracking and reporting on outreach visits to migrant and seasonal farmworkers.

Outreach staff use Vamos to create “Sites” (labor camps or houses where farmworkers live), or “Groups” (collections of sites, like “May 15 outreach list” or “Camps near our office”), write up “Visits” (reports on trips made to a site), and “Notes” (information or alerts that need follow up).

Code the Dream appreciates the ABE’s support in helping us build a more just and innovative world. Learn more about the ABE and the 2022 Opportunity Grant by clicking here.
